name: Cranberry Apple Breakfast Muffins
author: pitterpat7
summary: Growing up a friend's mother used to make these every fall. They are the perfect breakfast muffin, not too sweet with the tartness of the cranberries.
ingredients: 1  Granny Smith apple, cored and chopped
⅓ (12 ounce) package fresh cranberries, diced - or more to taste
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Grease 12 muffin cups or line with paper liners
Whisk flour, baking soda, cinnamon, salt, and brown sugar in a bowl
Beat vegetable oil, eggs, and vanilla extract in a separate bowl
Stir egg mixture into flour mixture to make a batter; gently fold apple and cranberries into batter
Bake in the preheated oven until muffins are lightly browned on top and a toothpick inserted into the center of a muffin comes out clean, 18 to 22 minutes
